p: We measured soil pH with a pH meter (PHSJ-3F, Shanghai Jingke Company). We analyzed soil total nitrogen (TN) and carbon (TC) contents (C/N analyzer, Vario MAX CN, Elementar Analysensysteme GmbH, Germany), total phosphorus (TP) (inductively coupled plasma atomic emission Spectrometry, ICP-AES), available (AP) phosphorus (Spectrophotometric molybdenum blue method), available nitrogen (AN) (Alkali N- proliferation method), and organic carbon (OC) (Tyurin titrimetric method).
